alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 6:11PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, Putnam, central Hancock, Greene, Taliaferro and southeastern Jasper Counties through 645 PM EST... At 609 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Wrayswood to Horns, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Greensboro, Crawfordville, Union Point, Woodville, White Plains, Siloam, Buckhead, Sharon, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Springfield, Veazey, Wrayswood, Resseaus Crossroads, Greshamville, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Plant Harlee Branch and Parks Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro
